Title: Illuminated Explicit with Tailpiece Inscribed with a Prayer for the Prophet Muhammad
Medium: ink and pigments on European laid paper
Description: This illuminated explicit from Walters manuscript W.580 contains a tailpiece inscribed with a prayer for the Prophet Muhammad (the salwalah), with a palmette at the left.
Keywords: Prayer; Arabic; Islamic; Book; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Contemporary Binding; Maghreb
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Abu al-Fadl 'Iyad ibn Mus√° al-Yahsubi al-Bahili (died 544 AH/AD 1149)
